name: Tremelo example using amplitude modulator
description: This is an example that shows how to use the fx_amplitude_mod effect to create a tremelo pedal effects.  The ADSR envelope standads for attack-decay- sustain-release and controls how quickly a note fades and out.  The sketch also demonstrates how to route the new note pedal event to the ADSR envelope so each time  you play a new note, the ADSR envelope is applied.
left-pot-function: The depth of the tremelo effect
right-pot-function: From counterclockwise to clockwise is sine -> triangle -> square -> random
right-switch-function: Tap this switch at a tempo to set the rate of the tremelo
creator: DreamMaker
